Rent Account Number Entered

notes.title: Case Note
notes.text:
Phone call made to client's partner (mother of 2 children) Natalie Campbell on 07983 486 391.

She confirmed that the police attended home whilst she was there to visit her children. She was also implicated in the incident.
She told me that she is currently staying with her sister in Catford in South London.
She confirmed that the children are currently with their father.

notes.title: Case Note
notes.text: Client was asked to leave after a report of assault and abuse.

notes.title: Case Note
notes.text: Client has presented as homeless on the day.  He has lived at his mother's house since 2008 with his two children.  Due to an allegation of domestic abuse by the client's mother and sister the police was called and the client was asked by the police to leave.  He has been living with the children in his car for the last two days.  He has no family or friends he can stay with.  The client ha been referred to duty and triaged (jigsaw 270305) and placed in the holding queue(ticket 1507).  His contact number is 07957783064.

notes.title: Note
notes.text:
Client needed assistance bidding, I checked his ELLC account which was working fine. The client wanted more time to check out the properties on offer so did not place a bid this morning. 

I also gave the client details of the homefinders website.

notes.title: Note
notes.text: Applicant came to the office to check the progress on his bidding.
